main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving a cigar-shaped object falling from the vapor trails of a jet aircraft in Ridgewood, New York on December 27, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as nearly white and the size of a medium orange at arm's length., Witness reported the UFO appeared snowball-shaped before disappearing at a 45-degree angle., The sighting lasted between 4.5 to 5 seconds., It was noted that this object might have been intercepted by fighter aircraft., Preliminary analysis suggested it could be a weather balloon.
witness description: 42-year-old teacher at City College, alternate coach of U.S. Olympic fencing team
